amendment.description: To promote economic growth and job creation by increasing exports.

vote.text: Amendment SA 15, under the order of 1/27/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 34.

action.text: Amendment SA 15 proposed by Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S400; text: CR S400) To promote economic growth and job creation by increasing exports.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 15, under the order of 1/27/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 34.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 15, under the order of 1/27/2015, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 45. Record Vote Number: 34.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 15 proposed by Senator Cruz to Amendment SA 2.
